attach(bytes32,string).notice: Attach a renderer to the surface.

create(bytes32,string,string).notice: Create a render surface with a kind and mount point.

destroy(bytes32).notice: Destroy a surface, cleaning up all mounted content.

mount(bytes32,string,string).notice: Mount a component tree into a zone on the surface.

unmount(bytes32,string).notice: Unmount a component tree from a zone on the surface.
